## Description {#details}

The default implementation of <em><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mca/sourcemgr">SourceMgr</a></em>.

It always takes a fixed number of instructions and provides an option to loop the given sequence for a certain iterations.

Definition at line 59 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mca/sourcemgr-h">SourceMgr.h</a>.

### hasNext() {#aa031b6a78fde1a9184b6d0995c9594e6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::mca::CircularSourceMgr::hasNext () const"
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Whether there is any <em><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mca/#a6194ec8d4ff9d0552963291008b31ee7">SourceRef</a></em> to inspect / peek next.

Note that returning false from this doesn&#39;t mean the instruction stream has ended.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mca/sourcemgr-h/#l00072">72</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mca/sourcemgr-h">SourceMgr.h</a>.
